name: Word Align (Industrial)
description: Industrial-grade dataset for word-level speech-text alignment used to benchmark forced aligners.

metrics.name: aac_ms
metrics.definition: Average Alignment Cost in milliseconds between predicted and reference word boundaries

test_method: Run a forced alignment model to obtain word timestamps, then compute absolute timing error against annotated references.
notes: Dataset is not publicly released; only aggregate metrics are available. Document alignment algorithm and decoder configuration.
